content: paw coaster designed by crochetcrafters1 © 2025 crochetcrafters1 - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to sell finished products with your own photos in small quantities but if you do so please give pattern credit to crochetcrafters1 thank you and enjoy stitches and abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - grey and pink - yarn needle - scissors final size - length 12 cm and width 16 cm technical notes *finish all pieces before attaching them together *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *each round is joined with a slip_stitch *the slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch of the round not of the of the chains *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern paw/coaster start with pink round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a sl st 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 1 double_crochet in the first st 1 half_double_crochet and 1 single_crochet in the next st then 1 slip_stitch in the next st then repeat 1 slip_stitch in the next st followed by 1 single_crochet and 1 half_double_crochet in the next st then 1 double_crochet in the next st then 1 half_double_crochet and 1 single_crochet in the next st then 1 slip_stitch in the next st two times then make 1 single_crochet in each of the next 5 sts finaly make 1 slip_stitch then in the last st make 1 single_crochet and 1 half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 26 sts *change colour to grey round 4 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 39 sts *fasten_off digits start with pink make four round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts *change colour to grey round 2 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts *fasten_off and leave a 15 cm yarn tail to sew to the paw link to video https //youtu be/x41raoh4j0m if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
